item.title: 美国 30 年期抵押贷款利率降至 7% 以下，刺激购房热情
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率一个月来首次回落到 7% 以下，刺激了购房申请的增加。【原文：US mortgage rates dropped back below 7% for the first time in a month, spurring an increase in applications for home purchases.】

item.title: 萨拉森的朱尼厄斯说，瑞士央行应在不等待欧洲央行的情况下降低利率
item.description: Bank J Safra Sarasin Ltd 首席经济学家卡斯滕-朱尼厄斯（Karsten Junius）认为，瑞士国家银行不应等待全球同行降息，而应在下周采取降息行动。【原文：The Swiss National Bank shouldn’t wait for global peers to cut interest rates and ought to go ahead with a move next week, according to Bank J Safra Sarasin Ltd Chief Economist Karsten Junius.】

item.title: 由于韩国建筑商的负资产，Taeyoung 股票停牌
item.description: 韩国 Taeyoung Engineering & Construction Co. 的股票被暂停交易，因为这家陷入困境的建筑商称重组费用将其拖入负资产。【原文：Shares of Korea’s Taeyoung Engineering & Construction Co. were suspended from trading after the distressed builder said restructuring charges dragged it into negative equity.】

item.title: 卡冈亚戈称南非有望摆脱 "脏钱 "名单
item.description: 南非央行行长表示，南非应能在明年初从一个有影响力的全球监督机构的黑钱监测名单中除名，他同时对南非当初被列入该名单表示遗憾。【原文：South Africa should escape an influential global watchdog’s dirty-money monitoring list early next year, the head of the country’s central bank said, while lamenting that it ever ended up there in the first place.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在华尔街再创历史新高之后，股市仍在努力寻找方向。肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）成为最新的大热门，他建议美联储在降息问题上谨慎行事。以下是今天市场的动向— David Goodman【原文：Good morning. Stocks struggle for direction after another record day on Wall Street and Ken Griffin becomes the latest big hitter to tell the Fed to move cautiously on rate cuts. Here’s what’s moving markets today — David Goodman】

item.title: 津巴布韦因汉万吉（Hwange）电站故障而加紧停电
item.description: 津巴布韦电力公司在发生故障中断供电后加大了对这个南部非洲国家的停电力度。【原文：Zimbabwe’s power utility intensified power cuts in the southern African nation after a fault disrupted supply.】

item.title: 估值担忧引发印度小型股下挫
item.description: 由于证券监管机构对市场中风险最高的部分的泡沫和估值过高表示担忧，投资者受到惊吓，印度小型股票的跌幅创下两年多来最大。【原文：Smaller Indian stocks tumbled the most in more than two years as concerns raised by the securities regulator about froth and stretched valuations in the riskiest segment of the market spooked investors.】

item.title: 欧元区生产下滑，2024 年经济步履蹒跚
item.description: 欧元区的工业生产在今年年初出现下滑，这使得整个经济在第一季度难以实现增长。【原文：Euro-area industrial production slumped at the start of the year, raising the prospect that the economy as a whole is struggling to grow in the first quarter.】

item.title: KKR 主导 HarbourView 音乐版税 5 亿美元债务交易
item.description: KKR & Co Inc. 将牵头为 HarbourView Equity Partners 提供 5 亿美元的一揽子融资，HarbourView Equity Partners 是一家以收购 Brad Paisley 和 Luis Fonsi 等著名艺人的音乐版权而闻名的基金管理公司，总资产达 16 亿美元。【原文：KKR & Co Inc. is leading a $500 million financing package for HarbourView Equity Partners, a $1.6 billion money manager known for acquiring music rights of famous artists such as Brad Paisley and Luis Fonsi.】

item.title: 劳埃德将 60 亿英镑的苏格兰寡妇年金出售给罗西塞公司
item.description: 劳埃德银行集团（Lloyds Banking Group Plc）将把其苏格兰寡妇（Scottish Widows）子公司的 60 亿英镑（76.7 亿美元）大宗年金投资组合出售给养老金保险专业公司 Rothesay Life Plc。【原文：Lloyds Banking Group Plc will offload a £6 billion ($7.67 billion) portfolio of bulk annuities from its Scottish Widows subsidiary to pensions insurance specialist Rothesay Life Plc.】

item.title: 调查显示，香港企业在亚洲执行 "返回办公室 "规定最严格
item.description: 一项调查显示，与亚洲其他中心城市相比，香港雇主迫使员工定期在办公室工作的比例最高。【原文：Hong Kong has the highest proportion of employers pressuring their staff to work in the office regularly compared with competing hubs in Asia, according to a survey.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）工作组在巴基斯坦审查贷款计划，同时寻求新的资金
item.description: 国际货币基金组织官员将于本周与巴基斯坦就其贷款计划举行会谈，而巴基斯坦总理谢赫巴兹-谢里夫领导的新政府已准备向总部设在华盛顿的贷款机构寻求更多资金。【原文：International Monetary Fund officials will hold talks with Pakistan this week on its loan program, as the new government under Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif already prepares to seek more funding from the Washington-based lender.】

item.title: 壳牌为节约成本将裁减约 20% 的交易团队职位
item.description: 据知情人士透露，壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）将裁撤其交易团队至少 20% 的职位，因为该公司将继续重组其业务部门，以努力降低成本。【原文：Shell Plc will eliminate at least 20% of jobs in its deals team as the company continues to restructure its business units in an effort to reduce costs, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 据说日本央行将酝酿取消 ETF 购买，继续购买债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本央行官员正在考虑取消 2010 年推出的购买交易所交易基金的措施，前提是央行的通胀目标能够实现。【原文：Bank of Japan officials are considering scrapping the buying of exchange-traded funds, a measure introduced in 2010, provided the central bank’s inflation target comes into sight, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧元贬值后，欧盟希望为埃及提供 74 亿欧元的一揽子援助计划
item.description: 在埃及应对以色列-哈马斯冲突后果的过程中，欧盟正在努力为埃及制定一项援助计划，提供约 74 亿欧元（约合 81 亿美元）的赠款和贷款。【原文：The European Union is working toward an aid package for Egypt that would provide some €7.4 billion ($8.1 billion) in a mix of grants and loans as the country copes with fallout from the Israel-Hamas conflict.】

item.title: 维珍货币在 Nationwide 交易即将达成之际提供可吸收损失的债券
item.description: 维珍货币英国公司（Virgin Money UK Plc）正在出售保释债务，而这正是全美房屋建筑协会（Nationwide Building Society）酝酿潜在收购的背景。【原文：Virgin Money UK Plc is selling bail-in debt just as a potential takeover by Nationwide Building Society is brewing in the background.】

item.title: 英国石油公司与 Adnoc 公司收购以色列 NewMed 公司股份的交易暂停
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）和阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.【原文：BP Plc and Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.’s bid to buy a 50% stake in NewMed Energy for $2 billion has been put on ice, the Israeli company said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 利润下滑后瑞银亚洲财富部门开始裁员
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）本周开始在其亚洲私人银行部门裁员，原因是该地区最大的财富管理公司利润下滑。【原文：UBS Group AG started cutting jobs at its Asia private banking division this week as a slump in profits weighs on the region’s largest wealth manager, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 维多利亚地毯制造商回购债券的资金耗尽
item.description: 维多利亚公司（Victoria Plc）正在努力寻找足够多的愿意以当前价格出售其证券的债券持有人，因为这家地板和地毯生产商正寻求回购其票据，以管理利息支付并降低到期应付金额。【原文：Victoria Plc is struggling to find enough bondholders willing to sell their securities at current prices as the flooring and carpet maker seeks to buy back its notes to manage interest payments and bring down the amount due at maturity.】

item.title: 摩根大通印度 ECM 主管 Abhinav Bharti 据说将离开该行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根大通印度股票资本市场主管阿比纳夫-巴蒂（Abhinav Bharti）即将离开这家美国银行。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s India head of equity capital markets Abhinav Bharti is leaving the US bank, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰国中央银行加大力度降低 91% 的家庭负债率
item.description: 泰国央行正在推出更多措施，以确保债务重组取得成功，从而减少约 4 540 亿美元的未偿家庭债务。【原文：The Bank of Thailand is rolling out more measures to ensure the success of a debt restructuring to reduce about $454 billion in outstanding household obligations.】

item.title: EQT 护肤品业务 Galderma 确定 26 亿美元首次公开募股条款
item.description: 护肤品公司 Galderma Group AG 确定了 23 亿瑞士法郎（约合 26 亿美元）的首次公开募股价格区间，这将是自 2022 年保时捷公司在欧洲上市以来规模最大的一次上市。【原文：Skincare company Galderma Group AG set the price range for a 2.3 billion Swiss franc ($2.6 billion) initial public offering, in what would be the largest listing in Europe since that of Porsche AG in 2022.】

item.title: 卡扎克称欧洲央行将在未来数次会议上做出降息决定
item.description: 2024 年 1 月 26 日星期五，拉脱维亚里加，拉脱维亚银行行长马丁斯-卡扎克斯在拉脱维亚欧元十年会议的小组讨论中。此次会议汇集了政策制定者、专家和民间社会代表，他们在整个欧洲，特别是拉脱维亚引入欧元的过程中发挥了关键作用。摄影师：Andrey Rudakov/Bloomberg【原文：Martins Kazaks, governor of the Bank of Latvia, during a panel session at the Ten Years Of Euro In Latvia conference in Riga, Latvia on Friday, Jan. 26, 2024. The conference brings policy makers, experts and civil society representatives who played a pivotal role in the introduction of the euro all across Europe and specifically in Latvia. Photographer: Andrey Rudakov/Bloomberg】

item.title: 中国顾问指出习近平推动工业发展的地缘政治风险
item.description: 一位为中国政府提供咨询的著名经济学家表示，中国需要拉动内需并调整产业政策，以应对美国和欧洲对中国产能过剩的批评。【原文：China needs to boost domestic demand and adjust its industrial policy to counter rising criticism of overcapacity from the US and Europe, according to a prominent economist who advises the government.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国经济以 0.2% 的增长为 2024 年开局打下坚实基础
item.description: 2023 年 10 月 12 日星期四，英国伦敦，城市工人走过建筑工程。由于占主导地位的服务业抵消了制造商和建筑公司本月的疲软，英国经济在 8 月份出现小幅反弹。【原文：City workers walk past construction work in London, UK, on Thursday, Oct. 12, 2023. The UK economy registered a modest rebound in August as the dominant services sector offset another weak month for manufacturers and construction firms.】

item.title: 三家中东财富基金接近 1 万亿美元大关
item.description: 石油资源丰富的中东即将成为唯一一个拥有三万亿美元财富基金的地区。【原文：The oil-rich Middle East is close to becoming the only region with three trillion-dollar wealth funds.】

item.title: 大众汽车大量新车型推动欧洲销量增长
item.description: 随着德国汽车制造商对高尔夫等畅销车型进行更新换代，大众汽车公司预计未来几个月西欧的订单量将加速增长。【原文：Volkswagen AG expects orders in western Europe to pick up speed in the coming months as the German carmaker updates popular models such as the Golf.】

item.title: 流入符合指数条件的印度债券的资金将达到 100 亿美元
item.description: 在印度被摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co）纳入其新兴市场债务指数之前，流入印度主权债券市场的外资正接近 100 亿美元大关。【原文：Foreign inflows into India’s sovereign bond market are closing in on the $10 billion mark ahead of the country’s inclusion in the JPMorgan Chase & Co’s emerging markets debt index.】

item.title: BAT 出售 21 亿美元股权，消除主要障碍，ITC 跳涨
item.description: 随着英美烟草公司（British American Tobacco Plc）要约出售这家印度烟草和消费品制造商 21 亿美元股份的交易开始，ITC Ltd. 3.6% 的股权以大宗交易方式成交，该公司股价创下近四年来最大涨幅。【原文：Shares of ITC Ltd. surged the most in nearly four years after 3.6% of the company’s equity traded in block deals as British American Tobacco Plc’s offer to sell a $2.1 billion stake in the Indian tobacco and consumer goods products maker commenced.】
